recipesJson.name: Frigid Punishments
recipesJson.author: mlNikon
recipesJson.description: I didn't know what to call this so I just used the random name atf gave me. I took Shyndo's lemon frosty base and added blueberries to it. Its a great sweet and creamy blueberry and lemon vape.

reviews.text: Super good Em - I dont have CAP Sweet Cream so I used  VTA Sweet Cream.   Really tasty :-)
Simple and delicious. The FW Blueberry / VT Bilberry Ripe is a great combo. Thank you!
